resources.string:
Provisioning a Personal ID (PID)

In the following screens, information will be collected for provisioning of a PID.

The PID can either contain hard-coded data for fictional person or data derived from the chip in an ePassport or eID document.

For simplicity, in this version of the Issuing Authority the PID is generated and signed on-device however our software stack also supports securely and privately conveying the collected evidence to an issuance server for evaluation and signing of the PID.

The created PID will be bound to this device.

Note to SPRIND Funke EUDI Wallet Jury:This document type is included solely as a technology demonstrator of our the OWF Identity Credential project provisioning protocol. Please refer to our written report for more information.
